snippet.title: Thirsty Heroes - Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
The King demands treasure, but you're a barkeeping Quartermaster, not adventuring hero! Hire tavern patrons for the dirty work in this dungeon-crawling business sim game with turn-based deckbuilding combat. Coming Summer 2021 to PC & Mobile.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1247470/
Get Notified on mobile release: https://thirstyheroes.com/#mailing
More at: https://thirstyheroes.com
